title: Patcher not proceeding to login screen
body:
Title. Client patches. I press LAUNCH, after 3-5 minutes, it gives me the license agreement, then nothing. 

Close patcher. reopen patcher. asks me again for the LA. ok...

replies.body: It sounds like you might have an unstable network issue that's failing to connect properly or receive acceptance of the license agreement.  As a first step, I recommend going over our [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to fix up whatever is causing this block.  Let me know if you have any issues afterwards!

> [{quoted}](name=Porocles,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=KyAg0PeQ,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2016-08-03T23:56:58.962+0000)
>
> It sounds like you might have an unstable network issue that's failing to connect properly or receive acceptance of the license agreement.  As a first step, I recommend going over our [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to fix up whatever is causing this block.  Let me know if you have any issues afterwards!

I'm thinking it's moreso the terrible air client that Riot's held onto for 5 years. My connection is 100% fine with anything else, and it doesn't even have the occasional dc unless it's a literal ISP maintenance. 

Why would a connection issue be the issue if I can manage to receive patch files (download+update), accept the license agreement many times after trying LAUNCH (many meaning after reopening client), and even use internet in the first place? 
As another note, whenever I start the launcher itself, even when it's just idling, everything on my comp starts fizzling(music) and lagging in some way. Still the connection's fault? And it's not cause my pc is bad, unless you call 16 GB ram and recent gen i7 bad.
